text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-Appointment.recurrenceTemplate

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionDetails of the recurrence pattern/template used to generate occurrences
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:timezone 0..1ExtensionThe timezone of the occurrences
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptThe timezone of the occurrences
Binding: Cross-version VS for R5.IANATimezones for use in FHIR R4 (required): IANA Timezones (BCP 175)
extension:recurrenceType 1..1ExtensionThe frequency of the recurrence
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptThe frequency of the recurrence
Binding: appointment-recurrrence-type (??) (preferred): IANA Timezones (BCP 175)
extension:lastOccurrenceDate 0..1ExtensionThe date when the recurrence should end
value[x] 0..1dateThe date when the recurrence should end
extension:occurrenceCount 0..1ExtensionThe number of planned occurrences
value[x] 0..1positiveIntThe number of planned occurrences
extension:occurrenceDate 0..*ExtensionSpecific dates for a recurring set of appointments (no template)
value[x] 0..1dateSpecific dates for a recurring set of appointments (no template)
extension:weeklyTemplate 0..1ExtensionInformation about weekly recurring appointments
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:monday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Mondays
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Mondays
extension:tuesday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Tuesday
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Tuesday
extension:wednesday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Wednesday
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Wednesday
extension:thursday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Thursday
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Thursday
extension:friday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Friday
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Friday
extension:saturday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Saturday
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Saturday
extension:sunday 0..1ExtensionRecurs on Sunday
value[x] 0..1booleanRecurs on Sunday
extension:weekInterval 0..1ExtensionRecurs every nth week
value[x] 0..1positiveIntRecurs every nth week
extension:monthlyTemplate 0..1ExtensionInformation about monthly recurring appointments
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:dayOfMonth 0..1ExtensionRecurs on a specific day of the month
value[x] 0..1positiveIntRecurs on a specific day of the month
extension:nthWeekOfMonth 0..1ExtensionIndicates which week of the month the appointment should occur
value[x] 0..1CodingIndicates which week of the month the appointment should occur
Binding: Cross-version VS for R5.WeekOfMonth for use in FHIR R4 (required): The set of weeks in a month.
extension:dayOfWeek 0..1ExtensionIndicates which day of the week the appointment should occur
value[x] 0..1CodingIndicates which day of the week the appointment should occur
Binding: days-of-week|5.0.0 (??) (required): The days of the week.
extension:monthInterval 1..1ExtensionRecurs every nth month
value[x] 0..1positiveIntRecurs every nth month
extension:yearlyTemplate 0..1ExtensionInformation about yearly recurring appointments
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Closed by value:url
extension:yearInterval 1..1ExtensionRecurs every nth year
value[x] 0..1positiveIntRecurs every nth year
extension:excludingDate 0..*ExtensionAny dates that should be excluded from the series
value[x] 0..1dateAny dates that should be excluded from the series
extension:excludingRecurrenceId 0..*ExtensionAny recurrence IDs that should be excluded from the recurrence
value[x] 0..1positiveIntAny recurrence IDs that should be excluded from the recurrence
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Appointment.recurrenceTemplate"

Documentation for this format

name: ext_R5_Appointment_recurrenceTemplate
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Appointment.recurrenceTemplate for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Appointment.recurrenceTemplate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Details of the recurrence pattern/template used to generate occurrences
element.definition: The details of the recurrence pattern or template that is used to generate recurring appointments.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

element.definition: The interval defines if the recurrence is every nth week. The default is every week, so it is expected that this value will be 2 or more.e.g. For recurring every second week this interval would be 2, or every third week the interval would be 3.

The interval defines if the recurrence is every nth week. The default is every week, so it is expected that this value will be 2 or more.e.g. For recurring every second week this interval would be 2, or every third week the interval would be 3.

The interval defines if the recurrence is every nth week. The default is every week, so it is expected that this value will be 2 or more.e.g. For recurring every second week this interval would be 2, or every third week the interval would be 3.
